(resending this since I used a wrong from email address; sorry for the  
dup)

On Sep 17, 2009, at 11:37 AM, Eric J. Bowman wrote:

> REST is the only Uniform Interface defined for distributed hypermedia
> applications. REST is a unique hybrid of network and application
> architectural principles with a firm grounding in Computer Science,
> whereas WS-* ignores the principles of network architecture and has a
> firm grounding in corporate profit-seeking.

You may then find it ironic that the HTTP and SOAP specs have an  
author in common. :)

- Steve
